spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall room zoning roughly matches (kitchen/dining left, living central, bedrooms right, laundry bottom-left, bath center-right), but several layout details diverge. Hall/entry circulation reads narrower/reshaped versus the large hall shown on plan (E4). Interior partition alignment around the hall–closet–bath cluster does not cleanly match the 2D wall breaks (E2). Multiple interior door locations/swing directions are not faithfully represented (several openings appear as doorless voids and/or shifted) (E2/E3). Window/door fenestration does not consistently match the plan—some openings appear enlarged or relocated compared to the 2D window pattern (E2/E5).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness looks mostly consistent, but door embedding is unreliable: several planned hinged doors (bedroom/bath/closet/laundry) are missing as actual door elements or are placed ambiguously (E1/E2). Adjacency relationships are mostly correct (no major room swaps), yet the closet network is not faithfully realized: at least one closet from the plan is unclear/absent or merged into the hall/bath partitioning (E1/E2). No strong evidence of an entirely new room, but at least one exterior opening reads like a full-height door where the plan indicates standard windows (E5).

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen/dining and living room furniture generally aligns (dining table, sofa/coffee table grouping). Bedroom 1 contains a bed as expected. Bedroom 2 furniture does not match the plan intent (appears staged as an office with no bed), indicating a missing/incorrect primary furniture element (E1/E2). Furniture scale is broadly plausible, though the altered staging affects perceived room use and proportion.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric camera is generally correct and readable. Lighting is clean and even, with minimal noise. Geometry is mostly clean (no major mesh distortions), and composition is clear. However, some openings/frames read inconsistent (door/window treatment varies), reducing orthographic-like clarity and fidelity (E6).

detected_errors.description: Hall/entry circulation proportions appear compressed/reshaped compared with the large hall footprint shown on the 2D plan.
Partition alignment around the hall–closet–bath core does not match the 2D wall break locations, suggesting shifted interior walls.
Planned interior doors are not consistently modeled (several door elements are missing; openings appear as doorless voids).
Where doors are implied, swing/orientation does not consistently match the 2D plan’s hinged door directions.
At least one closet shown on the 2D plan is unclear/absent or merged into adjacent space in the 3D layout.
Bedroom 2 is missing its primary bed furniture as indicated by the 2D plan (rendered instead as an office-like setup).
One or more exterior openings appear as full-height door-like glazing where the 2D plan indicates standard window openings (fenestration hallucination/overstatement).
Window placement/size pattern does not consistently match the 2D plan (some windows appear relocated or resized).
Inconsistent door/window frame treatment reduces clarity (some openings lack consistent framing/door panels).
